meanings.definition: A person who creates or works with concepts.
meanings.sent1: The conceptualists in the art class enjoyed discussing abstract ideas.
meanings.sent2: The conceptualists at the conference shared innovative ways to approach problem-solving.
meanings.sent3: The conceptualists decided to create a new language based solely on emotions.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a playground where conceptualists danced with creativity.
meanings.sent5: The conceptualists painted vivid pictures with their words, inspiring others to think differently.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of conceptualists.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with conceptualists artwork, each piece thought-provoking.
meanings.sent2: Her writing style was undeniably conceptualists, focusing on abstract themes.
meanings.sent3: The conceptualists approach to problem-solving was both unique and effective.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a maze of conceptualists ideas, always exploring new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The conceptualists perspective offered a fresh and imaginative view of the world.
